Welcome

BUY GIFT CARDS

We are Jon's Cakes

Jon's Cakes is an award winning professional cake maker & decorator based in Worsley, serving Greater Manchester & Lancashire. We offer a variety of freshly baked and beautifully presented wedding cakes, birthday cakes, cupcakes, novelty cakes and more.

Our cakes can be personalised to suit any event, theme or occasion.

All our delicious cakes and bakes are made from scratch using tried and tested recipes. We only use top quality ingredients to guarantee a taste sensation.

Feel free to take a look at our gallery and feast your eyes on some of the tasty delights we've created.

Any of our existing cakes in the gallery can be re-ordered or for something different just let us know what ideas you have and the number of servings you require. Then we'll take care of everything else, assisting you with the creativity side and sharing ideas. we're very flexible.

Proudly serving the following local areas, Tottington, Bury, Manchester, Rochdale, Darwen, Oldham, Whitefield, Prestwich, Ramsbottom, Accrington, Manchester, Bolton and the North West..
 
Best Wishes,

Jon's Cakes Team

We're now providing balloons for all occasions to give your celebration that extra wow factor.

We're very pleased to announce that Jon's Cakes Is now selling personalised balloons for all occasions, Have a look at our previous work in our balloon Gallery.

Feedback

Recent customer comments...
Karin Golding

Oct 2019

Jon's Cakes made our wedding cake and it was amazing! I was quite nervous to only see it on 'the big day' but I needn't have been. After having the consultation and giving our ideas, they got it spot on. The cake looked beautiful right up to the skull bride and groom topper. All 3 tiers tasted great too. The whole thing ran smoothly, the cake was even delivered on a Monday when they aren't open. I highly recommend Jon's Cakes!
